name: the cat at the top of the hill
name_original: the cat at the top of the hill
description:
double posting this gamearooni into both the bitsy essay jam and the bitsy classic jam.

i made this in bitsy classic then ported it into bitsy 7.2 because bitsy classic has weird issues!

this was very much a stream of consciousness kinda thing. [a character gazing at a distant star] has been a symbol that's been with me for a long time, but it's usually a cyclops staring out, not a bitsy cat. the dialogue text is one part riffing on a neato star fact, and one part longing for the death of the united states. in retrospect i think i was discharging a 2020 loneliness/ennui kinda vibe, and then trying to nail it down once i caught on to what i was doing.

i hope you enjoyed this lil gamedoodle :- )
